title: attack-pattern
description: The Attack Pattern object is a STIX TLO that describes a general approach for attacking a system or network. In addition to the standard TTP properties, it has a reference to a CAPEC (Common Attack Pattern Enumeration and Classification - http://capec.mitre.org/) ID

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `attack-pattern`

capec_id.description: Specifies a reference to an entry in the CAPEC dictionary.
